name: gbikes
description: This is a website for covid19

scripts.usemin: usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin gallery.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/gallery.html && usemin Products.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/Products.html && usemin BikesForKids.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/BikesForKids.html && usemin StuntBikes.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/StuntBikes.html && usemin MountainBikes.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/MountainBikes.html && usemin EBikes.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/EBikes.html && usemin About.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/About.html && usemin Contactus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/Contactus.html  && usemin Blog.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/Blog.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin

author: Aviv Sharon
